paragraphs.name: 4be7
paragraphs.text: The Rockets played the Warriors at home on Tuesday, in a clash with zero playoff implications. With a handful of games to go — and barring supernatural, mathematically impossible collapses — the 1–4 seeds in the Western Conference are locked up. San Antonio can light a fire under Golden State by winning out, but the latter closes with six of its last seven games at home, in Oracle Arena, where it’s too loud to see.

d0deb77c00fb.title: As someone who’s often irritated by the way Harden plays basketball, I’m perfectly happy to…

paragraphs.text: As someone who’s often irritated by the way Harden plays basketball, I’m perfectly happy to celebrate his successes when they are immediately followed by dismal failures.
paragraphs.name: d382

cde60edf0d73.title: Good crossover but Draymond was forcing him to his right and Harden did exactly that, thus he got…

paragraphs.text: Good crossover but Draymond was forcing him to his right and Harden did exactly that, thus he got blocked by the Warriors bigman. Klay and Steph were on the other side and neither would block Harden there if he were able to get to his left. That one goes to Draymond.
paragraphs.name: 2ff4

paragraphs.name: 760a

paragraphs.text: Probable MVP? The league value of defense, and rebounding has dropped so much the walking turnstile is the probable MVP? He plays in a system that any guard that passes could get 10+ assists a night. Imagine what Chris Paul could do with that team? Yes, he gets fouled a lot, but he’s also great a conning the refs. Oh, and his defense is woeful.
paragraphs.name: 4a43

8ff192f1195d.title: As many other posters have already said, why is James Harden the probably MVP?

paragraphs.text: As many other posters have already said, why is James Harden the probably MVP? I think it is a two way race but the obvious lead must and should go to Westbrook. Leonard is great, but he isnt putting up historic numbers while both harden and especially westbrook are. The only plus Harden has over Westbrook is that his team is simply better. He has…
paragraphs.name: 3bef

869e099a4bc3.title: So not only is offense over-valued now, but looking good before missing a shot is something to…

paragraphs.text: So not only is offense over-valued now, but looking good before missing a shot is something to celebrate? Pfft.

paragraphs.text: You’re kidding right? The Spurs are like 2 games back and can pick up a whole game on Chef Curry and the Ws tomorrow night. The 1 seed is very much up for grabs.
